name: A Free Kids Easter Bunny Egg Hunting Game - Free version
name_original: A Free Kids Easter Bunny Egg Hunting Game - Free version
description:
Are you ready to hunt for Easter eggs?

Are you ready to run, jump and collect as many as you can while escaping pesky bugs, poisonous frogs and spiky porcupines!

Get ready for this epic Easter bunny egg hunt game where you have to collect them all!

Jump in and enjoy the fun!

Featuring:
- Great Easter holiday artwork and animations
- Fun tap to jump gameplay
- Fun for the kids and all the family!
